title: Enhance MemoryBlock and BlockLink Schemas for Production Use
goal: Enhance both MemoryBlock and BlockLink schemas to support production use cases with state management, visibility controls, versioning, and scalable graph traversal while maintaining backward compatibility.
action_items: [x] Add new fields to MemoryBlock model:
[x]   - Make embedding explicitly Optional[List[float]] with vector size enforcement
[x]   - Add max_items=20 constraint to tags list
[x]   - Create script to generate Dolt schema from Pydantic models
[x]   - Add support for custom type mappings
[x]   - Run schema generation script to create updated schema.sql
[x]   - Add new columns: status, visibility, block_version
[x]   - Create composite index on (type, state, visibility)
[x] Update BlockLink model to support graph scaling:
[x]   - Enforce canonical relation types with stricter validation
[x]   - ALTER TABLE to add priority, link_metadata, created_by, created_at fields
[x]   - Create INDEX on to_id for reverse graph traversal optimizations
[x]   - Add new columns with default values
[x]   - Update existing blocks with appropriate state/visibility
[x]   - Migrate/update block_links to default priority 0, link_metadata as NULL
[x] Add validation logic for state/visibility transitions
[x] Update query patterns to use new indexes
